SELECT WEDDING_ID weddingId , LOCATION location , WEDDING_DTM weddingDtm , PAY_YN payYn , CREATE_DTM createDtm , UPDATE_DTM updateDtm , STATUS status , GROOM_NM groomNm , BRIDE_NM brideNm
FROM WEDDING_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND GROOM_NM = #{groom} AND BRIDE_NM = #{bride}

SELECT h.HOST_ID hostId , h.WEDDING_ID weddingId , h.HOST_NM hostNm , h.HOST_TYPE hostType , h.FATHER_NM fatherNm , h.MOTHER_NM motherNm , h.ORDER_NM orderNm , h.PROFILE_ATT profileAtt , h.CREATE_DTM createDtm , h.UPDATE_DTM updateDtm , h.STATUS status , h.ACCOUNT account , h.BANK bank , a.ATTACH_NM attachNm
FROM host_info h INNER JOIN wedding_attach_info a ON h.WEDDING_ID = a.WEDDING_ID and h.PROFILE_ATT = a.ATTACH_ID WHERE h.STATUS = 'Y' AND h.HOST_TYPE = 'M' AND h.WEDDING_ID = #{weddingId}
